resources.string: If call fails, hang up and app will automatically call another friend

Friend Line was built as part of the InterTech and Facebook LGBT+ 2014 'Make Stuff Better' hackathon in London.
 
 It was created in 24 hours (so there are a few features we have yet to complete) by:
 Benno Ommerborn
 Joseph Finlayson
 Louise Franklin
 Justin King-Lacroix
 Richard Matheson
 Liudas Survila
